document_data.name: Varlamar
document_data.mainbody: '''Varlamar''' was a caravan guard in the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: After one damaging ambush early in a trip between [[Scornubel]] and [[Waterdeep]], [[Orthil Voldovan]] called for Varlamar to light up the [[brazier]]s at night. He had to call for him to do it again shortly after, as Varlammar had yet to light those braziers.
